ygData.subject: RE: Wakishi quest
ygData.msgSnippet: It can t hurt.  Let us know! =)  Also if you ever manage to find Arlena and give Grimlot her bones instead of the lute of the gypsy princess, would be
ygData.messageBody:
It can't hurt. Let us know! =) Also if you ever manage to find Arlena and
give Grimlot her bones instead of the lute of the gypsy princess, would be
interesting to know what that quest gives. Another reason I doubt Grimlot
has anything to do with the Wakizishi or the Lute is because he mentions
Arlena, and she is not who carries the lute. just thought of that. anyway,
good luck.

Shada

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jesse [mailto:j@...]
> Sent: Sunday, July 25, 1999 3:19 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Wakishi quest
>
>
> From: Jesse <j@...>
>
>
> > > You were playing your dark elf SK when you tested, right?
>
> > talk about the lute to a dark elf SK? i doubt it, and
> being told by many
> > how to really get the wakizishi,having nothing to do with
> grimlot, i figure
> > grimlot is not part of it.
>
> Oh, I've agreed from the beginning that this is a bogus
> quest. From the
> moment I heard it. But I'm still not gonna claim to know it's false,
> absolutely, positively, until I've done it the way they say
> it's supposed
> to be done. So, of course, I asked. That's all.
>
